definition: what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-bradycardic effect of xindekuai(XDK)in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究心得快抗心动过缓作用。

sentences.english: I think that this is the life of Qian Mu History tells us that experience.
sentences.chinese: 我想，这是钱穆治史一生告诉我们的心得。

sentences.english: Discuss and share key learning in the implementation of the area and find out issues.
sentences.chinese: 讨论并分享在实施过程中的心得，并找出存在的问题。

sentences.english: I will write something about my studies once a week in the future.
sentences.chinese: 以后，我也会每周写一次我的学习心得。

sentences.english: The oral propranolol test was conducted for positive rate.
sentences.chinese: 进行口服心得安试验，观察其阳性率。

sentences.english: Of course, I am more willing to share their experience with you has.
sentences.chinese: 当然我更愿意与大家交流心得了。

sentences.english: Introductions to the experiences of Professor SONG Xin-wei in treating Sjogren's Syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 介绍宋欣伟教授中医中药治疗干燥综合征的心得体会。

sentences.english: I am willing to share the summary of the advance class with others.
sentences.chinese: 本人愿意在高级班上课时上台和学员分享本篇心得。

sentences.english: Written case studies in the form of stories or reports can serve to capture the lessons learned during the experimentation process.
sentences.chinese: 以故事或书面报告的形式撰写实验过程中的心得体会。

sentences.english: The second part, mainly summarized the clinical experience of professor WangMianZhi.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要总结王绵之教授的临床心得。

sentences.english: Some of our members are keen on astrophotography, polishing mirror and making telescopes.
sentences.chinese: 部分会员对于天文摄影与望远镜磨制甚有心得。

sentences.english: "sunshine incense burners produce purple clouds" Purple is 11 more delicate observation of the experience.
sentences.chinese: “日照香炉生紫烟”的紫是多幺细腻观察的心得。

sentences.english: Mei Ying shares her home-making wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 梅英分享她的理家心得。

sentences.english: After every lectured, each student needs to write their report about the lecture.
sentences.chinese: 课程中安排数场演讲，同学听讲后撰写心得报告。

sentences.english: Here you can discuss your investment, trade experience and so on.
sentences.chinese: 买家和卖家交易及投资的经验交流与心得。

sentences.english: These methods are auther's experiences that were gotten by auther working on highway engineering for more ten years.
sentences.chinese: 这是作者在十多年的公路工程施工中的一点心得介绍。

definition: to share (let others have some of sth good)
what one has seen and heard/knowledge/one's experience
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
